document.full_text: some of the leading pop stars from the emi label have donated personal possessions to raise funds for the japanese red cross in its efforts to aid victims of the recent earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: emi stars launch charity for japan red cross
lines_and_colors: some of the leading pop stars from the emi label have donated personal possessions to raise funds for the japanese red cross in its efforts to aid victims of the recent earthquake and tsunami.
